mapper.insert: insert into regist(userid, userpwd, username, email, gender, birth, code) values(#{userid}, #{userpwd}, #{username}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{code})
mapper.select: select userid, username, active from regist where userid = #{userid} and userpwd = #{userpwd}
select userid, userpwd, username, email, gender, to_char(birth,'YYYY-MM-DD') birth from regist where userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update regist set userpwd = #{userpwd}, email = #{email} where userid=#{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from regist where userid=#{userid} and userpwd=#{userpwd}
mapper.select: select userid from regist where username = #{username} and email=#{email}
select email from regist where username=#{username} and userid=#{userid} and email=#{email}
select username, active, email, code from regist where email=#{email} and code=#{code}
mapper.update: update regist set active ='Y' where email=#{email} and code =#{code}
